properties.name: size
properties.description: The size of Spinner to render in px.

properties.name: label
properties.description:
The label to show next to the Spinner. Label updates will be announced to the screen readers.
Use ariaLive to control politeness level.

properties.name: className
properties.description: Additional CSS class(es) to apply to the Spinner.

properties.name: ariaLive
properties.description: Politeness setting for label update announcement.

properties.name: ariaLabel
properties.description: Alternative status label for screen reader

properties.name: styles
properties.description: Call to provide customized styling that will layer on top of the variant rules.

properties.name: labelPosition
properties.description: The position of the label in regards of the spinner animation.

members.name: ISpinnerStyleProps

properties.name: className
properties.description: CSS class name for the component attached to the root stylable area.

properties.name: labelPosition
properties.description: Position of the label in regards to the spinner animation.

properties.name: root
properties.description:
Styles for the root element. Refers to the wrapper containing both the
circle and the label.

properties.name: circle
properties.description: Styles for the spinner circle animation.

properties.name: label
properties.description: Styles for the label accompanying the circle.

properties.name: screenReaderText
properties.description: Styles for the hidden helper element to aid with screen readers.

members.name: SpinnerLabelPosition
members.description: Possible locations of the label in regards to the spinner
